attributes.action: allow more than one person to sign from the same email address
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that if people use the same email address (husband and wife, etc) only one of them can sign an e petition!

So the figures seen will not be a true representation of the number of people who would be signing.

This looks like yet another way to keep the figures down,

No wonder the British people are fed up.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
